title: Part One: Alfred Hitchcock: The Director Who Randomly Tortured People
itunes:title: Part One: Alfred Hitchcock: The Director Who Randomly Tortured People
description:
Was it worth it? In Episode 41, Robert is joined by Abed Geith to discuss Alfred Hitchcock the  brilliant director who also tortured his friends and employees.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
